#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int t, n[1001];
int main()
{
    cin >> t;
    for (int i = 1; i <= t; i++){
        cin >> n[i];
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= t; i++){
        if (n[i] % 6 == 0)
            cout << "Misha" << '\n';
        else
            cout << "Chef" << '\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
